page.title: 17LIFE-STYLES
page.content: Of the families interviewed in Glasshouses we found that about 45% of the people had lived in the village,or within 2 or 3 miles of here all their lives; about 11% had come from towns and villages up to 15 miles away, whilst the remaining 44% of the people have moved into the area in the past ten years from all over England and a few from all over the world. About 25 of the houses had only one resident; 30 houses had 2 people living there and 15 houses had 3 people in residence; there were 25 houses with 4 people and 9 with 5 people living there. There were no large families. All families had a vacuum cleaner, 20% had a fridge,15% had a freezer, 16% had an automatic washing machine, 8% had a tumbler drier,18% had a colour TV,8% had a video,5% had a computer.
